channel.title: Null?
channel.description: hi guys, every time I try to pickup 3rd age armor, i get a null ? can someone tell me how to fix that, I know its something to do with the client, but I dont know how to fix.

item.title: Null?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

go into class8.java and search the item you want to be recognized

at the top the item id is therâ€¦ change the id to match the id that is in your source
